archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.2.6d: d) cases where labelling may be omitted (e.g. not labelling non-confidential information to reduce workload) or is not possible (e.g. due to technical or legal restrictions)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
